Hours: 12:00 M to 12:00 AM.

 Phone: +53 7 2029941
 Mobile: +53 5118723

 HABANERA, founded on November 6, 2015, is located at 16 #506 between 5th and 7th Avenue, Miramar, Beach; An emblematic area of the city when it's about good taste, Refinement and elegance.

The Restaurant, with an ample portal and three lovely salons. It features an elegant and air-conditioned dinner-room, With facilities for presentations or meetings of work. Also, a large patio with an outdoor bar.

The Culinary Offers, start from the Republican era style, The cooking of the house recreates the favorite dishes by improving them, renewing them and styling them according to the new culinary tendencies and the art of its breezy Chef.
Next to the De La Casa card, An Eco-Menu of dishes of the ecological cooking completes the culinary panorama.

The Bar, equipped with the most varied drinks from any part of the planet and a wide range of cocktails, cubans in their majority, offers the possibility of tasting, perceiving, tasting, comparing and evaluating with utter tranquility the subtler flavors hidden in each of their offerings.
